posts.title: Manifesting Community at Manifest 2025
posts.author: Azmyth
posts.excerpt: As we prepare for Manifest 2025, we're exploring how prediction markets and coffee culture intersect. Join us for specialty brews while discussing the future of forecasting and community decision-making.

posts.title: The Science Behind Our Health Brews
posts.author: Zak
posts.excerpt: From adaptogenic mushrooms to sea moss slurps, we're pioneering functional beverages that nourish both body and mind. Discover the research behind our most popular health-focused creations.

posts.title: Art Meets Algorithm: Our Curation Process
posts.author: Leah
posts.excerpt: How do we select the artists and artworks that grace our spaces? It's a blend of data-driven insights and intuitive aesthetic choices that creates our unique atmosphere.

posts.title: Pop-up Philosophy: Creating Temporary Sacred Spaces
posts.author: Jasmine
posts.excerpt: Every pop-up is an experiment in community building. We explore the intentional design choices that transform any space into a hub for meaningful connections and conversations.

posts.title: From Berkeley to SF: Expanding Our Vision
posts.author: Sid
posts.excerpt: The numbers behind our growth story. How we're scaling our coffee+art concept while maintaining the intimate, thoughtful experience that makes Gratified special.
